ensureTexture

public Object ensureTexture(GLContext ctx,
                            boolean repeatX,
                            boolean repeatY)
Description copied from class: ImageGL
Creates a texture for this image (if one does not already exist) and returns it. May return null if the underlying image data is not yet ready.

Overrides:
ensureTexture in class ImageGL

clearTexture

public void clearTexture(GLContext ctx)
Description copied from class: ImageGL
Releases this image's texture memory.

Overrides:
clearTexture in class ImageGL

reference

public void reference(GLContext ctx)
Description copied from class: ImageGL
Increments this image's reference count. Called by ImageLayerGL to let the image know that it's part of the scene graph. Note that this reference counting mechanism only exists to make more efficient use of texture memory. Images are also used by things like Pattern which does not support reference counting, thus images must also provide some fallback mechanism for releasing their texture when no longer needed (like in their finalizer).

Overrides:
reference in class ImageGL

release

public void release(GLContext ctx)
Description copied from class: ImageGL
Decrements this image's reference count. Called by ImageLayerGL to let the image know that may no longer be part of the scene graph.

Overrides:
release in class ImageGL

setBounds

public void setBounds(float x,
                      float y,
                      float width,
                      float height)
Description copied from interface: Image.Region
Updates this region's bounds in its parent image. If you need a rapidly changing region of an image, this can be more efficient than repeatedly creating new subimages as it creates no garbage to be collected.

Specified by:
setBounds in interface Image.Region

addCallback

public void addCallback(ResourceCallback<? super Image> callback)
Description copied from interface: Image
Adds a callback to be notified when this image has loaded. If the image is already loaded, the callback will be notified immediately. The callback is discarded once the image is loaded.

Specified by:
addCallback in interface Image

subImage

public Image.Region subImage(float x,
                             float y,
                             float width,
                             float height)
Description copied from interface: Image
Returns an image that draws the specified sub-region of this image.

Specified by:
subImage in interface Image
Parameters:
x - the x offset (in pixels) of the subimage.
y - the y offset (in pixels) of the subimage.
width - the width (in pixels) of the subimage.
height - the height (in pixels) of the subimage.

transform

public Image transform(Image.BitmapTransformer xform)
Description copied from interface: Image
Generates a new image from this image's bitmap, using a bitmap transformer created for the platform in use. See JavaBitmapTransformer and IOSBitmapTransformer. This does not work on sub-images.

Specified by:
transform in interface Image
